question: Who won the Lifetime Achievement Award at the 7th National Photography Awards?
explanation: The 7th National Photography Awards 2019 were presented by Union Minister for Information and Broadcasting Col. Rajyavardhan Rathore at a function held at the National Media Centre on 19th Feb. In it, ace photographer Ashok Dilwali has been bestowed with the Life Time Achievement Award, who is known for his work on the Himalayas. A total of 13 awards carrying cash prizes were presented to the winners in professional and amateur categories. Shanth Kumar won the \'Professional Photographer of the Year\' award, while Gurdeep Dhiman won award for \'Amateur Photographer of the Year\'. The theme for the Professional category was “Women-led Development” and theme for Amateur category was “Fairs and Festivals of India”.
